== Main Inclusion Report for p7zip ==

 0. ''Availability:'' 
** The package is available in Ubuntu universe http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/p/p7zip, built on all platforms.
 0. ''Rationale:''  
** Allows the opening of 7zip files by default.
** Offers high compression ratio.
 0. ''Security:'' 
** No CVEs or other security issues.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''  
** 1 (but 215 days old and unreproduceable) important bugs in "<nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/p7zip|Debbugs]]</nowiki>"
** No critical bugs in <nowiki>[[http://sourceforge.net/tracker/?group_id=111810&atid=660493|upstream bug tracker]]</nowiki>
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets the FHS and the Debian Policy.
** Standard debhelper packaging
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** all already in main
